$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional properties for the resource.

$eref.description: Properties used to create an environment.

___dataRetentionTime.description: ISO8601 timespan specifying the minimum number of days the environment's events will be available for query.

___storageLimitExceededBehavior.description: The behavior the Time Series Insights service should take when the environment's capacity has been exceeded. If "PauseIngress" is specified, new events will not be read from the event source. If "PurgeOldData" is specified, new events will continue to be read and old events will be deleted from the environment. The default behavior is PurgeOldData.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Properties used to create an environment.

$eref.description: The sku determines the capacity of the environment, the SLA (in queries-per-minute and total capacity), and the billing rate.

___capacity.description: The capacity of the sku. This value can be changed to support scale out of environments after they have been created.

_88Sku.description: The sku determines the capacity of the environment, the SLA (in queries-per-minute and total capacity), and the billing rate.

_88EnvironmentCreationProperties.description: Properties used to create an environment.

___dataRetentionTime.description: ISO8601 timespan specifying the minimum number of days the environment's events will be available for query.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___storageLimitExceededBehavior.description: The behavior the Time Series Insights service should take when the environment's capacity has been exceeded. If "PauseIngress" is specified, new events will not be read from the event source. If "PurgeOldData" is specified, new events will continue to be read and old events will be deleted from the environment. The default behavior is PurgeOldData.

_88EventHubEventSourceCreateOrUpdatePara.description: Parameters supplied to the Create or Update Event Source operation for an EventHub event source.

$eref.description: Properties of the EventHub event source that are required on create or update requests.

___eventHubName.description: The name of the event hub.

___keyName.description: The name of the SAS key that grants the Time Series Insights service access to the event hub. The shared access policies for this key must grant 'Listen' permissions to the event hub.

___sharedAccessKey.description: The value of the shared access key that grants the Time Series Insights service read access to the event hub. This property is not shown in event source responses.

___eventSourceResourceId.description: The resource id of the event source in Azure Resource Manager.

___serviceBusNamespace.description: The name of the service bus that contains the event hub.

___timestampPropertyName.description: The event property that will be used as the event source's timestamp. If a value isn't specified for timestampPropertyName, or if null or empty-string is specified, the event creation time will be used.

___consumerGroupName.description: The name of the event hub's consumer group that holds the partitions from which events will be read.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Properties of the EventHub event source that are required on create or update requests.

_88EventHubEventSourceCreationProperties.description: Properties of the EventHub event source that are required on create or update requests.

___eventHubName.description: The name of the event hub.

___keyName.description: The name of the SAS key that grants the Time Series Insights service access to the event hub. The shared access policies for this key must grant 'Listen' permissions to the event hub.

___sharedAccessKey.description: The value of the shared access key that grants the Time Series Insights service read access to the event hub. This property is not shown in event source responses.

___eventSourceResourceId.description: The resource id of the event source in Azure Resource Manager.

___serviceBusNamespace.description: The name of the service bus that contains the event hub.

___timestampPropertyName.description: The event property that will be used as the event source's timestamp. If a value isn't specified for timestampPropertyName, or if null or empty-string is specified, the event creation time will be used.

___consumerGroupName.description: The name of the event hub's consumer group that holds the partitions from which events will be read.

_88IoTHubEventSourceCreationProperties.description: Properties of the IoTHub event source that are required on create or update requests.

___keyName.description: The name of the Shared Access Policy key that grants the Time Series Insights service access to the iot hub. This shared access policy key must grant 'service connect' permissions to the iot hub.

___sharedAccessKey.description: The value of the Shared Access Policy key that grants the Time Series Insights service read access to the iot hub. This property is not shown in event source responses.

___eventSourceResourceId.description: The resource id of the event source in Azure Resource Manager.

___timestampPropertyName.description: The event property that will be used as the event source's timestamp. If a value isn't specified for timestampPropertyName, or if null or empty-string is specified, the event creation time will be used.

___consumerGroupName.description: The name of the iot hub's consumer group that holds the partitions from which events will be read.

___iotHubName.description: The name of the iot hub.

___description.description: An description of the access policy.

___roles.description: The list of roles the principal is assigned on the environment.

___principalObjectId.description: The objectId of the principal in Azure Active Directory.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___keyName.description: The name of the Shared Access Policy key that grants the Time Series Insights service access to the iot hub. This shared access policy key must grant 'service connect' permissions to the iot hub.

___sharedAccessKey.description: The value of the Shared Access Policy key that grants the Time Series Insights service read access to the iot hub. This property is not shown in event source responses.

___eventSourceResourceId.description: The resource id of the event source in Azure Resource Manager.

___timestampPropertyName.description: The event property that will be used as the event source's timestamp. If a value isn't specified for timestampPropertyName, or if null or empty-string is specified, the event creation time will be used.

___consumerGroupName.description: The name of the iot hub's consumer group that holds the partitions from which events will be read.

___iotHubName.description: The name of the iot hub.
